mapper.select: SELECT A.*, CASE WHEN B.DB_NAME IS NULL THEN 'A' WHEN A.DATA_TYPE != B.DATA_TYPE THEN 'D' WHEN A.DATA_LENGTH != B.DATA_LENGTH THEN 'L' ELSE 'N' END AS CHANGE_GUBN FROM TCKCOL A, (SELECT * FROM TCKCCS A WHERE DB_NAME = #{dbName} AND OWNER = #{owner} AND OBJECT_NAME = #{tableName} AND EVENT_SEQ = (SELECT NVL(MAX(EVENT_SEQ), 1) -1 FROM TCKCCS B WHERE B.DB_NAME = A.DB_NAME AND B.OWNER = A.OWNER AND B.OBJECT_NAME = A.OBJECT_NAME)) B WHERE A.DB_SID = B.DB_NAME(+) AND A.OWNER = B.OWNER(+) AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.OBJECT_NAME(+) AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME(+) AND A.DB_SID = #{dbName} AND A.OWNER = #{owner} AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} ORDER BY COLUMN_ID
